xstampp.ui.navigation

Class StepSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • xstampp.ui.navigation.AbstractSelector
      • xstampp.ui.navigation.StepSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection, IProjectSelection

    public class StepSelector
extends AbstractSelector
    a Selection class which is used to carry information about the project step
    Author:
    Lukas Balzer
